settings.content: If you require any support please review the [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1565085-documentation) or contact us at [support@pixelunion.net](mailto:support@pixelunion.net)
Find us on the web: [Pixel Union](http://www.pixelunion.net) | Twitter: [@pixelunion](http://twitter.com/pixelunion) | Facebook: [http://facebook.com/pixelunion](http://facebook.com/pixelunion)

settings.label: Choose layout
settings.info: When the navigation layout is set to 'header,' navigation will collapse into the 'navigation drawer' if there is not enough space.

settings.label: Enable mega navigation
settings.info: The mega navigation system is only functional when the navigation layout is set to 'below header.'

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order.
Each section can only be used once on the home page.
Note: To change the background, text and button colors, find the "Home: slideshow and featured promotion sections" menu within the "Colors" section.

settings.label: Header colors override
settings.info: If your header colors and full bleed slideshow image are clashing, this will override the home page header colors to be only white or black.

settings.label: Use custom logo override
settings.info: If you have enabled one of the full bleed slideshows and have selected either the "white" or "black" header colors override you may want to upload an additional logo.

settings.content: Note: To change the text colors on the slide, including navigation, find the "Home: slideshow and featured promotion sections" menu within the "Colors" section.
This section is designed to showcase your product philosophy. Display up to three full width features, either as images or videos. Expand on each feature with a heading, caption and button.

The [alternating features](http://cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/alternating-features-screenshot.png) are designed to explain product specifics in a clean and organized format. This section can display up to three features with alternating alignments.

settings.label: Description
settings.info: Override your long product description with one better suited to the home page.

settings.label: Enable express checkout
settings.info: Sends the customer directly to the checkout screen after adding the product to their cart. This feature is disabled if "line item properties" is enabled in the "Products" section.

settings.label: Show images with a specific tag
Show when stock is lower than:
Disable sold out variants
settings.info: Disables 'sold out'/'unavailable' variants in the product variant selectors so that they are no longer clickable.

settings.content: The slideshow can be enabled on a product by product basis by changing the product's template to product.slideshow. You can change any product's template at the bottom of the product edit screen for that product.
You may need to use overrides for the header when using the "full width, full bleed" or "full width/height, full bleed" slideshow layouts.
If you have selected either the "white" or "black" header colors override you may want to upload an additional logo.

[Additional info links](https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.pixelunion.net/startup/additional-info-screenshot.png) appear wherever a customer can view product information. They’re perfect for linking to size charts, refund policies, or ordering details. Pick from six unique icons.

settings.label: Stay on the current page when an item is added to the cart
Enable order notes
settings.info: This feature gives your customers the ability to attach a note to the order.

settings.label: Default country
settings.info: If a customer is logged in to their account, their default shipping address country will be selected.

settings.content: See the [documentation](http://help.pixelunion.net/customer/portal/articles/1565085-documentation) for help connecting a MailChimp or Campaign Monitor account.

settings.label: RSS
settings.info: http://your-store.myshopify.com/blogs/news.atom (Your shop's blog's RSS is already available from the blog page)

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
